channel.title: Dry Skin
channel.description:
Dry skin is an especially prevalent problem for ceramicists who repeatedly wet their hands in the studio, for example during throwing.
## Why?
solubles in clay? constant wetting/drying cycles?
## Solutions
Types of hand creams Talcum powders Changing water
